title: The Platypus Quarrel
itunes:title: The Platypus Quarrel
description:
When European naturalists saw a platypus for the first time, they found it so bizarre that they thought it was fake, and then argued about how to classify it for almost a century. This happened in tandem with similar discussions about another Australian animal – the echidna, or spiny anteater – and discussions of scientific taxonomy in general. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
